document.full_text: right-wing lawmaker keiko fujimori's lead over leftist ollanta humala appears to be growing ahead of peru's june 5 presidential run-off, polls by survey firms ipsos and cpi showed on sunday.
document.title: peru's fujimori leads humala in presidential poll
lines_and_colors: right-wing lawmaker keiko fujimori's lead over leftist ollanta humala appears to be growing ahead of peru's june 5 presidential run-off, polls by survey firms ipsos and cpi showed on sunday.
